title: Walk and Talk: From Deconstruction to Orthodoxy
description: Today I talk about how deconstruction led me down a path that led me to Orthodoxy and how I hope to continue a journey of reconstruction. Lots of rambling, as is typical with my walk and talks. But hopefully it isn’t too all over the place! 😅
